title: Ivanti warns critical EPM bug lets hackers hijack enrolled devices
description: Ivanti fixed a critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in its Endpoint Management software (EPM) that can let unauthenticated attackers hijack enrolled devices or the core server. [...]

title: Russian hackers wiped thousands of systems in KyivStar attack
description: The Russian hackers behind a December breach of Kyivstar, Ukraine's largest telecommunications service provider, have wiped all systems on the telecom operator's core network. [...]

title: Hackers hijack govt and business accounts on X for crypto scams
description: Hackers are increasingly targeting verified accounts on X (formerly Twitter) belonging to government and business profiles and marked with 'gold' and 'grey' checkmarks to promote cryptocurrency scams. [...]

title: Zeppelin ransomware source code sold for $500 on hacking forum
description: A threat actor announced on a cybercrime forum that they sold the source code and a cracked version of the Zeppelin ransomware builder for just $500. [...]

title: FTC offers $25,000 prize for detecting AI-enabled voice cloning
description: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has started accepting submissions for its Voice Cloning Challenge, a public competition with a $25,000 top prize for ideas that protect consumers from the danger of AI-enabled voice cloning for fraudulent activity. [...]

title: 'everything' blocks devs from removing their own npm packages
description: Over the holidays, the npm package registry was flooded with more than 3,000 packages, including one called "everything," and others named a variation of the word. These 3,000+ packages make it impossible for all npm authors to unpublish their packages from the registry. [...]
